name: 楊元森
objective: This course is intended to provide the students with programming ability with C++. Emphasis is placed on developing students' ability to both comprehending and coding C++ programs. Topics include widely used data types, mathematical operations, branching, loop, arrays, functions, structures, and fundamental classes.
schedule:
W01: Introduction to C++ integrated development environment
W02: Basic input, output, data types
W03: Mathematical operations and functions
W04-05: Branching
W06-08: Loop
W09: Midterm
W10-11: Nested loop
W12-13: Arrays
W14-15: Functions
W16: Structures and fundamental classes
W17: Review of fundamental C++ 
W18: Final examination
scorePolicy:
Attendance, quiz, lecture activity: 20% +/- 5%
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final exam.: 50% +/- 5%
remarks:
本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
In case of COVID-19 level 3 pandemic alert, the lecture will try to carry out the midterm and final examination online through Google Meet with all attendees' webcam on. The online examination will be close book.
